about_the_game:
Embark on a Quest of Self-Discovery and Redemption

Play as CJ, a young boy with hardly any disc golf experience.  Following the death of your estranged grandmother, you are issued a quest: compete in the annual Paradisc Island Open and earn your inheritance!

Upon your arrival to the mysterious island, you cross paths with Cary, your grandmother’s lively disc golf bag, with whom you strike up a deal to accompany you on your quest. As your journey continues, you will encounter an eclectic cast of characters, including a new friend, a bitter rival, a verklempt witch, and maybe even an ancient God!? Make new friends as you aid their journeys, but be wary of ulterior motives as you learn the ins and outs of the Island; there is more to most than meets the eye…

                                    Dynamic Top-Down Disc Golf Gameplay

Choose your throw type, line up your shot, and execute your timing to make the perfect throw! Anything less, and you may just end up stuck in the woods or sinking into a pond. With added elements such as wind and a variety of special obstacles to consider, every level offers a unique challenge for those who want to be the best. And with every success comes added experience and an opportunity to level up. Choose to improve either your accuracy or your power, and watch CJ grow right alongside you!

Your journey through Paradisc Island’s unique courses will lead you to find many magical new discs. These discs, each imbued with a unique power, allow you to reshape the terrain and take advantage of the course in your own way. You could use the Buzzsaw to chop right through pesky trees that block your path, or use Frost to freeze the water beneath your feet and avoid going out of bounds. There are all kinds of different discs to unlock, each with different timing, throw shapes, and magical powers. The only question that remains; how will you use them?

                                   Find Your Line and Discover Hidden Secrets

In addition to the standard 18 holes per course, there are over 20 mystery levels to unlock and experience. Throughout each course, be on the lookout for special Hidden Baskets. Scoring on these will unlock a mystery level that can be played at any point in your adventure, and provide unique, difficult, and sometimes strange challenges to overcome. 

Sprinkled around the world are secret tokens, echoes of your grandmother’s past life. These tokens are collectibles that can enrich your understanding of the Island, it’s locals, and your grandmother’s role in the world. Finding them all may even lead to a reward far greater than knowledge itself…

name: Disc Out!
short_description: Disc Out is a top-down disc golf adventure where you harness the power of magical discs to overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets. Master your timing, level up your skills, and defeat tricky bosses as you help Cary, a talking bag, on his quest to save Paradisc Island!
